## mulVQ variable

Multiplies quaternion `q` with 3D vector `v`<!-- -->. Returns transformed vector or modifies in-place if `out` is null or `v`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mulVQ: VecOpVV
```
